Author: LisichkaYenotik
Text: I went to Bulgaria after I had my heart broken and had *the binge of my life*. I threw up, not because I wanted to, but because my body was like "you put *how much in me?*"  That sparked a series of binges and in 6 months of binge - restrict - binge - restrict, I gained 5kg.  A kg seems so much scarier than a lb.

Author: The-Exploding-Girl
Text: My worst was a specific binge where I remember eating 5,000+ calories in one sitting, during a period where I was binge/purging about 5 times a day. The disgust I felt after this caused me to restrict heavily again and caused my diagnosis to change from bulimic to anorexic.
